text.text:
Hi! I'm a bot who can send you a top messages from given channels.
You can ask for different top sampling, order by different methods (like the rating or amount of replies in the topic), set up timers and your own presets. 
You can ask for help for any command by typing `help command_name` or just clicking buttons below. 
Available commands: 
```top
presets
timers{{'
qna' if qna_presented else ''}}``` 
If you want to submit an issue, bug or just ask how are we, you can look for #tool_digestbot channel in ODS.ai Slack workspace.
